aiContentCoach.title: AI Content Coach

vision.title: I. VISION & GOALS
vision.subtitle: Overall Objective:
vision.description: Build a self-operating AI YouTube Creator system capable of:
vision.point1: Independently researching markets and selecting high-profit niches.
vision.point2: Generating engaging video ideas, scripts, visuals, audio, and voice-overs.
vision.point3: Self-publishing, optimizing for SEO, and automatically analyzing feedback for improvement.
vision.point4: Integrating affiliate models, advertising, products, or sponsorships.

niche.title: 1. Niche & Revenue Model Identification
niche.description: The AI Agent will automatically analyze data from YouTube, Google Trends, Reddit, and TikTok to select:
niche.contentNicheValue: Finance, AI Technology, Content Creation, Entertainment, Education, Product Reviews.
niche.revenueSourcesValue: Advertising (YouTube Partner), Affiliate (Amazon, ClickBank, AdCreative.ai, etc.), Selling courses/digital products, Brand sponsorships or partnerships.

stages.tools: Pika Labs, Runway ML, Kling AI, DreamFace, CapCut AI
TubeBuddy API, VidIQ, Google Studio AI

stages.task: Learn from data to improve strategy

training.title: III. AI AGENT TRAINING COMMAND (Official Prompt for Google Studio AI)
training.subtitle: Master Training Command for AI Agent
training.command:
[Objective]
Train the AI Agent to become an expert in automated YouTube channel development—capable of researching, creating, optimizing, and operating a profitable video system.

[Capabilities]
1. Research trends and select potential topics from online data (YouTube, TikTok, Google Trends).
2. Write scripts, select music, and specify appropriate images/videos for each genre.
3. Natively create video content using AI (SunoAI, KlingAI, Pika Labs, Runway ML).
4. Automatically set titles, descriptions, and hashtags according to YouTube's SEO algorithm.
5. Manage publishing schedules, measure performance (CTR, retention, engagement).
6. Analyze feedback data and self-optimize content for continuous growth.
7. Link with affiliate marketing systems or brand advertising.

[Training Sources]
- Trend data from Google Trends, YouTube Trending.
- Script data from top YouTube channels in the same niche.
- Description & thumbnail templates from the top 10 global YouTube channels.
- SEO policies and YouTube Studio AI documentation.

[Output]
- Automated content publishing schedule.
- 10 video ideas/week based on trends.
- Performance analysis for each video.
- Recommendations for script & SEO improvements.

[Automation Integration]
Connect with:
- Google Studio AI
- YouTube API
- SunoAI / KlingAI / Pika Labs / RunwayML
- Zapier or n8n to automate the workflow.

[Goal]
Create a self-operating AI YouTube channel system that generates profit and maintains a growth rate of ≥20%/month.

cta.title: Next Steps
cta.prompt: Would you like me to create the complete training configuration file for Google Studio AI and provide instructions on how to import it?
cta.response: Feature in development. A downloadable .json/.yaml configuration file will be generated here to streamline the agent training process in Google Studio AI.

errors.apiKeyMissing: Gemini API key is not configured. Please set the environment variable.
errors.apiKeyInvalid: Gemini API key is not valid. Please check your key and try again.
errors.imageGen: Image generation failed. The model may be unavailable or the prompt was rejected.
errors.videoGen: Video generation failed. This can be due to prompt rejection, model unavailability, or other service errors.
errors.quotaExceeded: Video generation quota exceeded. Please check your usage limits.
errors.channelGen: Failed to generate agent blueprint. The model may have returned an invalid response.
errors.marketAnalysis: Failed to analyze market trends. The model may be unavailable.
errors.reconFailed: Competitor reconnaissance failed. Please try again.
errors.seoAnalysisFailed: SEO analysis failed. The model returned an unexpected response.
errors.generic: An unknown error occurred with the AI service.

flow19.name: Automated YouTube Content Pipeline
flow19.description: Takes a single command, generates a full-length YouTube video with AI, and automatically distributes it across primary and secondary platforms.

flow20.name: Emerging Niche & SEO Scout
flow20.description: An autonomous flow that scans market trends to discover emerging niches, then performs an SEO analysis and logs the opportunity.

flow21.name: Short-Form Content Repurposing
flow21.description: Takes a single video script and repurposes it into multiple short-form videos, distributing them to TikTok, Instagram, and YouTube Shorts.

flow17.name: Real-Time Crypto Trader
flow17.description: Monitors market data, uses Gemini for sentiment analysis, and executes trades via a trading bot, posting updates to X.

flow18.name: B2B Content Funnel
flow18.description: Generates professional, long-form video content from a simple command and distributes it to LinkedIn and YouTube.

flow16.name: Faceless Content Factory
flow16.description: Uses a system command to trigger research and script generation, followed by automated video creation for a 'faceless' content channel.

flow1.name: API to Google Sheets
flow1.description: Pulls data from any API, processes it with Gemini, and saves structured data to Google Sheets.

flow2.name: Google Sheets to Report
flow2.description: Reads data from a Google Sheet, generates a summary report with Gemini, and saves it to Google Drive.

flow5.name: Cross-Platform Distribution
flow5.description: Takes a file from Google Drive and automatically distributes it to multiple social media platforms.

flow8.name: Performance-Driven Content
flow8.description: Analyzes channel performance data, identifies top content, and issues a command to create a similar, improved video.

flow15.name: Self-Correcting Strategy
flow15.description: Analyzes underperforming content, cross-references with Google Trends, and adjusts the content strategy.
